articles.content: West Virginia is in the win column for the second week in a row, going down to Blacksburg and defeating rival Virginia Tech, 33-10. While the score may seem lopsided, the competition was actually qui… [+757 chars]

articles.title: Plenty of blame to go around for White Sox’ calamity of a season - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: The White Sox played the Cleveland Guardians Thursday in a game that didn’t matter. You could feel it in the clubhouse, on the field and in the crisp autumn air that re-introduced itself to Guaranteed Rate Field.
